Exemption for buildings used as nursery grounds
	In Schedule 5 to the Local Government Finance Act 1988 (non-domesticrating: exemption), in paragraph 3 (definition of “agricultural building”),omit the “or” after paragraph (a) and after paragraph (b) insert “, or
		it is or forms part of a nursery ground and is used solely in connectionwith agricultural operations at the nursery ground.”
	The amendment made by subsection (1) has effect—
		in relation to England, for financial years beginning on or after 1 April2015;
		in relation to Wales, for financial years beginning on or after 1 April2017.
Extent, interpretation and short title
	This Act extends to England and Wales.
	In this Act “financial year” means a period of 12 months beginning with 1April.
	This Act may be cited as the Non-Domestic Rating (Nursery Grounds) Act2018.
